017package org.apache.juneau.jsonschema;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.jsonschema.TypeCategory.*;
021
022import java.lang.reflect.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.function.*;
025import java.util.regex.*;
026
027import org.apache.juneau.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
033import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
034import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
035import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
036
037/**
038 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link JsonSchemaSerializer}.
039 *
040 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
041 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
045 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JsonSchemaDetails">JSON-Schema Support</a>
046 * </ul>
047 */
048public class JsonSchemaGeneratorSession extends BeanTraverseSession {
049
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051   // Static
052   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
053
054   /**
055    * Creates a new builder for this object.
056    *
057    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
058    * @return A new builder.
059    */
060   public static Builder create(JsonSchemaGenerator ctx) {
061      return new Builder(ctx);
062   }
063
064   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065   // Builder
066   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
067
068   /**
069    * Builder class.
070    */
071   @FluentSetters
072   public static class Builder extends BeanTraverseSession.Builder {
073
074      JsonSchemaGenerator ctx;
075
076      /**
077       * Constructor
078       *
079       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
080       */
081      protected Builder(JsonSchemaGenerator ctx) {
082         super(ctx);
083         this.ctx = ctx;
084      }
085
086      @Override
087      public JsonSchemaGeneratorSession build() {
088         return new JsonSchemaGeneratorSession(this);
089      }
090
091      // <FluentSetters>
092
093      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
094      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
095         super.apply(type, apply);
096         return this;
097      }
098
099      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
100      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
101         super.debug(value);
102         return this;
103      }
104
105      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
106      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
107         super.properties(value);
108         return this;
109      }
110
111      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
112      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
113         super.property(key, value);
114         return this;
115      }
116
117      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
118      public Builder unmodifiable() {
119         super.unmodifiable();
120         return this;
121      }
122
123      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
124      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
125         super.locale(value);
126         return this;
127      }
128
129      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
130      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
131         super.localeDefault(value);
132         return this;
133      }
134
135      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
136      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
137         super.mediaType(value);
138         return this;
139      }
140
141      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
142      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
143         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
144         return this;
145      }
146
147      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
148      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
149         super.timeZone(value);
150         return this;
151      }
152
153      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
154      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
155         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
156         return this;
157      }
158
159      // </FluentSetters>
160   }
161
162   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
163   // Instance
164   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
165
166   private final JsonSchemaGenerator ctx;
167   private final Map<String,JsonMap> defs;
168   private JsonSerializerSession jsSession;
169   private JsonParserSession jpSession;
170
171   /**
172    * Constructor.
173    *
174    * @param builder The builder for this object.
175    */
176   protected JsonSchemaGeneratorSession(Builder builder) {
177      super(builder);
178      ctx = builder.ctx;
179      defs = isUseBeanDefs() ? new TreeMap<>() : null;
180   }
181
182   /**
183    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified object.
184    *
185    * @param o
186    *    The object.
187    *    <br>Can either be a POJO or a <c>Class</c>/<c>Type</c>.
188    * @return The schema for the type.
189    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
190    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
191    */
192   public JsonMap getSchema(Object o) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
193      return getSchema(toClassMeta(o), "root", null, false, false, null);
194   }
195
196   /**
197    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified type.
198    *
199    * @param type The object type.
200    * @return The schema for the type.
201    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
202    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
203    */
204   public JsonMap getSchema(Type type) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
205      return getSchema(getClassMeta(type), "root", null, false, false, null);
206   }
207
208   /**
209    * Returns the JSON-schema for the specified type.
210    *
211    * @param cm The object type.
212    * @return The schema for the type.
213    * @throws BeanRecursionException Bean recursion occurred.
214    * @throws SerializeException Error occurred.
215    */
216   public JsonMap getSchema(ClassMeta<?> cm) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
217      return getSchema(cm, "root", null, false, false, null);
218   }
219
220   @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
221   private JsonMap getSchema(ClassMeta<?> eType, String attrName, String[] pNames, boolean exampleAdded, boolean descriptionAdded, JsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta jsbpm) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException {
222
223      if (ctx.isIgnoredType(eType))
224         return null;
225
226      JsonMap out = new JsonMap();
227
228      if (eType == null)
229         eType = object();
230
231      ClassMeta<?> aType;        // The actual type (will be null if recursion occurs)
232      ClassMeta<?> sType;        // The serialized type
233      ObjectSwap objectSwap = eType.getSwap(this);
234
235      aType = push(attrName, eType, null);
236
237      sType = eType.getSerializedClassMeta(this);
238
239      String type = null, format = null;
240      Object example = null, description = null;
241
242      boolean useDef = isUseBeanDefs() && sType.isBean() && pNames == null;
243
244      if (useDef) {
245         exampleAdded = false;
246         descriptionAdded = false;
247      }
248
249      if (useDef && defs.containsKey(getBeanDefId(sType))) {
250         pop();
251         return new JsonMap().append("$ref", getBeanDefUri(sType));
252      }
253
254      JsonSchemaClassMeta jscm = null;
255      ClassMeta objectSwapCM = objectSwap == null ? null : getClassMeta(objectSwap.getClass());
256      if (objectSwapCM != null && objectSwapCM.hasAnnotation(Schema.class))
257         jscm = getJsonSchemaClassMeta(objectSwapCM);
258      if (jscm == null)
259         jscm = getJsonSchemaClassMeta(sType);
260
261      TypeCategory tc = null;
262
263      if (sType.isNumber()) {
264         tc = NUMBER;
265         if (sType.isDecimal()) {
266            type = "number";
267            if (sType.isFloat()) {
268               format = "float";
269            } else if (sType.isDouble()) {
270               format = "double";
271            }
272         } else {
273            type = "integer";
274            if (sType.isShort()) {
275               format = "int16";
276            } else if (sType.isInteger()) {
277               format = "int32";
278            } else if (sType.isLong()) {
279               format = "int64";
280            }
281         }
282      } else if (sType.isBoolean()) {
283         tc = BOOLEAN;
284         type = "boolean";
285      } else if (sType.isMap()) {
286         tc = MAP;
287         type = "object";
288      } else if (sType.isBean()) {
289         tc = BEAN;
290         type = "object";
291      } else if (sType.isCollection()) {
292         tc = COLLECTION;
293         type = "array";
294      } else if (sType.isArray()) {
295         tc = ARRAY;
296         type = "array";
297      } else if (sType.isEnum()) {
298         tc = ENUM;
299         type = "string";
300      } else if (sType.isCharSequence() || sType.isChar()) {
301         tc = STRING;
302         type = "string";
303      } else if (sType.isUri()) {
304         tc = STRING;
305         type = "string";
306         format = "uri";
307      } else {
308         tc = STRING;
309         type = "string";
310      }
311
312      // Add info from @Schema on bean property.
313      if (jsbpm != null) {
314         out.append(jsbpm.getSchema());
315      }
316
317      out.append(jscm.getSchema());
318
319      Predicate<String> ne = Utils::isNotEmpty;
320      out.appendIfAbsentIf(ne, "type", type);
321      out.appendIfAbsentIf(ne, "format", format);
322
323      if (aType != null) {
324
325         example = getExample(sType, tc, exampleAdded);
326         description = getDescription(sType, tc, descriptionAdded);
327         exampleAdded |= example != null;
328         descriptionAdded |= description != null;
329
330         if (tc == BEAN) {
331            JsonMap properties = new JsonMap();
332            BeanMeta bm = getBeanMeta(sType.getInnerClass());
333            if (pNames != null)
334               bm = new BeanMetaFiltered(bm, pNames);
335            for (Iterator<BeanPropertyMeta> i = bm.getPropertyMetas().iterator(); i.hasNext();) {
336               BeanPropertyMeta p = i.next();
337               if (p.canRead())
338                  properties.put(p.getName(), getSchema(p.getClassMeta(), p.getName(), p.getProperties(), exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(p)));
339            }
340            out.put("properties", properties);
341
342         } else if (tc == COLLECTION) {
343            ClassMeta et = sType.getElementType();
344            if (sType.isCollection() && sType.getInfo().isChildOf(Set.class))
345               out.put("uniqueItems", true);
346            out.put("items", getSchema(et, "items", pNames, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null));
347
348         } else if (tc == ARRAY) {
349            ClassMeta et = sType.getElementType();
350            if (sType.isCollection() && sType.getInfo().isChildOf(Set.class))
351               out.put("uniqueItems", true);
352            out.put("items", getSchema(et, "items", pNames, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null));
353
354         } else if (tc == ENUM) {
355            out.put("enum", getEnums(sType));
356
357         } else if (tc == MAP) {
358            JsonMap om = getSchema(sType.getValueType(), "additionalProperties", null, exampleAdded, descriptionAdded, null);
359            if (! om.isEmpty())
360               out.put("additionalProperties", om);
361
362         }
363      }
364
365      out.append(jscm.getSchema());
366
367      Predicate<Object> neo = Utils::isNotEmpty;
368      out.appendIfAbsentIf(neo, "description", description);
369      out.appendIfAbsentIf(neo, "example", example);
370
371      if (useDef) {
372         defs.put(getBeanDefId(sType), out);
373         out = JsonMap.of("$ref", getBeanDefUri(sType));
374      }
375
376      pop();
377
378      return out;
379   }
380
381   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
382   private List<String> getEnums(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
383      List<String> l = list();
384      for (Enum<?> e : ((Class<Enum<?>>)cm.getInnerClass()).getEnumConstants())
385         l.add(cm.toString(e));
386      return l;
387   }
388
389   private Object getExample(ClassMeta<?> sType, TypeCategory t, boolean exampleAdded) throws SerializeException {
390      boolean canAdd = isAllowNestedExamples() || ! exampleAdded;
391      if (canAdd && (getAddExamplesTo().contains(t) || getAddExamplesTo().contains(ANY))) {
392         Object example = sType.getExample(this, jpSession());
393         if (example != null) {
394            try {
395               return JsonParser.DEFAULT.parse(toJson(example), Object.class);
396            } catch (ParseException e) {
397               throw new SerializeException(e);
398            }
399         }
400      }
401      return null;
402   }
403
404   private String toJson(Object o) throws SerializeException {
405      if (jsSession == null)
406         jsSession = ctx.getJsonSerializer().getSession();
407      return jsSession.serializeToString(o);
408   }
409
410   private JsonParserSession jpSession() {
411      if (jpSession == null)
412         jpSession = ctx.getJsonParser().getSession();
413      return jpSession;
414   }
415
416   private Object getDescription(ClassMeta<?> sType, TypeCategory t, boolean descriptionAdded) {
417      boolean canAdd = isAllowNestedDescriptions() || ! descriptionAdded;
418      if (canAdd && (getAddDescriptionsTo().contains(t) || getAddDescriptionsTo().contains(ANY)))
419         return sType.toString();
420      return null;
421   }
422
423   /**
424    * Returns the definition ID for the specified class.
425    *
426    * @param cm The class to get the definition ID of.
427    * @return The definition ID for the specified class.
428    */
429   public String getBeanDefId(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
430      return getBeanDefMapper().getId(cm);
431   }
432
433   /**
434    * Returns the definition URI for the specified class.
435    *
436    * @param cm The class to get the definition URI of.
437    * @return The definition URI for the specified class.
438    */
439   public java.net.URI getBeanDefUri(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
440      return getBeanDefMapper().getURI(cm);
441   }
442
443   /**
444    * Returns the definition URI for the specified class.
445    *
446    * @param id The definition ID to get the definition URI of.
447    * @return The definition URI for the specified class.
448    */
449   public java.net.URI getBeanDefUri(String id) {
450      return getBeanDefMapper().getURI(id);
451   }
452
453   /**
454    * Returns the definitions that were gathered during this session.
455    *
456    * <p>
457    * This map is modifiable and affects the map in the session.
458    *
459    * @return
460    *    The definitions that were gathered during this session, or <jk>null</jk> if {@link JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#useBeanDefs()} was not enabled.
461    */
462   public Map<String,JsonMap> getBeanDefs() {
463      return defs;
464   }
465
466   /**
467    * Adds a schema definition to this session.
468    *
469    * @param id The definition ID.
470    * @param def The definition schema.
471    * @return This object.
472    */
473   public JsonSchemaGeneratorSession addBeanDef(String id, JsonMap def) {
474      if (defs != null)
475         defs.put(id, def);
476      return this;
477   }
478
479   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
480   // Properties
481   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
482
483   /**
484    * Add descriptions to types.
485    *
486    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#addDescriptionsTo(TypeCategory...)
487    * @return
488    *    Set of categories of types that descriptions should be automatically added to generated schemas.
489    */
490   protected final Set<TypeCategory> getAddDescriptionsTo() {
491      return ctx.getAddDescriptionsTo();
492   }
493
494   /**
495    * Add examples.
496    *
497    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#addExamplesTo(TypeCategory...)
498    * @return
499    *    Set of categories of types that examples should be automatically added to generated schemas.
500    */
501   protected final Set<TypeCategory> getAddExamplesTo() {
502      return ctx.getAddExamplesTo();
503   }
504
505   /**
506    * Allow nested descriptions.
507    *
508    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#allowNestedDescriptions()
509    * @return
510    *    <jk>true</jk> if nested descriptions are allowed in schema definitions.
511    */
512   protected final boolean isAllowNestedDescriptions() {
513      return ctx.isAllowNestedDescriptions();
514   }
515
516   /**
517    * Allow nested examples.
518    *
519    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#allowNestedExamples()
520    * @return
521    *    <jk>true</jk> if nested examples are allowed in schema definitions.
522    */
523   protected final boolean isAllowNestedExamples() {
524      return ctx.isAllowNestedExamples();
525   }
526
527   /**
528    * Bean schema definition mapper.
529    *
530    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#beanDefMapper(Class)
531    * @return
532    *    Interface to use for converting Bean classes to definition IDs and URIs.
533    */
534   protected final BeanDefMapper getBeanDefMapper() {
535      return ctx.getBeanDefMapper();
536   }
537
538   /**
539    * Ignore types from schema definitions.
540    *
541    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#ignoreTypes(String...)
542    * @return
543    *    Custom schema information for particular class types.
544    */
545   protected final List<Pattern> getIgnoreTypes() {
546      return ctx.getIgnoreTypes();
547   }
548
549   /**
550    * Use bean definitions.
551    *
552    * @see JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder#useBeanDefs()
553    * @return
554    *    <jk>true</jk> if schemas on beans will be serialized with <js>'$ref'</js> tags.
555    */
556   protected final boolean isUseBeanDefs() {
557      return ctx.isUseBeanDefs();
558   }
559
560   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
561   // Extended metadata
562   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
563
564   /**
565    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
566    *
567    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
568    * @return The metadata.
569    */
570   public JsonSchemaClassMeta getJsonSchemaClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
571      return ctx.getJsonSchemaClassMeta(cm);
572   }
573
574   /**
575    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified bean property.
576    *
577    * @param bpm The bean property to return the metadata on.
578    * @return The metadata.
579    */
580   public JsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm) {
581      return ctx.getJsonSchemaBeanPropertyMeta(bpm);
582   }
583
584   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
585   // Utility methods
586   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
587
588   private ClassMeta<?> toClassMeta(Object o) {
589      if (o instanceof Type)
590         return getClassMeta((Type)o);
591      return getClassMetaForObject(o);
592   }
593}
